replies.body:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denial-of-service_attack

tl;dr
Sending an overwhelming amount of packets from one or multiple computers to overwhelm a personal network or website and send it offline, it is very illegal.

replies.body: I doubt you DDoSed, you probably just tried to do a DoS, which is just your internet versus your target's internet.  It doesn't usually shut it down, just slows it.
replies.body_tagged: I doubt you DDoSed, you probably just tried to do a DoS, which is just your internet versus your target's internet.  It doesn't usually shut it down, just slows it.

bump, I really think he should be unbanned for some reasons:
1- I don't know how jozz tracked he's ip, If there is a program to do that, then I need it, actually everyone in all pvp games needs it
2- I personally know him and I know that he is not that smart to learn how to DDos
3- Did you check the ip again? if so tell me so I can block him on skype, since he is in my team, I don't want to be DDosed

Also, he already appealed but got no response so don't just say "this is not the place to do the appeal thingy" because it's annoying

replies.body:
Let me give a real explanation for this. DDoS, is a Distributive Denial of Service attack. One computer will send a signal to a collection of computers called a bot-net. These computers will then flood the target with traffic, usually random messages.

Please read this to learn how to respond to a DDoS threat: http://www.planetminecraft.com/blog/how-to-handle-a-ddos-threat/]

Thanks for reading and have a great day!
replies.body_tagged:
Let me give a real explanation for this. DDoS, is a Distributive Denial of Service attack. One computer will send a signal to a collection of computers called a bot-net. These computers will then flood the target with traffic, usually random messages.

Please read this to learn how to respond to a DDoS threat: http://www.planetminecraft.com/blog/how-to-handle-a-ddos-threat/]

Thanks for reading and have a great day!
